text: "Hypnotized" is a 1973 song by British American band Fleetwood Mac and taken from their eighth studio album Mystery to Me. The track was released as a single to the B-side For Your Love. It was covered by The Pointer Sisters in 1978. == References == Category:1973 songs Category:Fleetwood Mac songs Category:The Pointer Sisters songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Psychedelic rock songs
title: Hypnotized (Fleetwood Mac song)
